column1: #Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Mom , I 'm so sorry .
#Text=I gave my life to Kuvira and she just fired that weapon at me .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I do n't know , sweetie .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Wing and Wei will never forgive me .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Yeah , they might take some time to come around .
#Text=But we 'll work through it as a family .
